full_text: OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY BARRY E. KRISCHER STATE ATTORNEY July 24, 2008 DET JOSEPH RECAREY #7915 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 345 S. COUNTY ROAD PALM BEACH, FL 33480 Re: State of Florida vs. JEFFREY E EPSTEIN Court Case No: 2006CF009454AMB- 2008CF009381AMB Agency: PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT Agency Case No: 05-0368 Dear Det Recarey: The case described above was closed on 06/26/2008 with the following result: PLED GUILTY TO CHARGES AND SENTENCED TO 12 MO IN COUNTY JAIL, FOLLOWED BY 6MO DOC AND 12MO COMMUNITY CONTROL. DESIGNATED A SEX OFFENDER If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. Sincerely, COPY LANNA BELOHLAVEK Assistant State Attorney cc: Evidence Custodian: evidence is no longer needed 401 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401-4209 (561) 355-7100 07/26/17 Page 2395 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032708
